Author: missalligator
Text: Nuts and seeds are good for tossing into things like oatmeal and salad so you get more in and it doesnâ€™t feel like more food. I personally like pumpkin seeds, flax, chia seeds, sliced almonds.

Author: dark_side_sunchips
Text: Get the beans and maybe make some overnight oats for tomorrow so you can have some food before noon if you feel like eating. It's okay to have a low day. Stay safe
